title: Black Crown Initiate - The Wreckage Of Stars (2014)
description:
Description
Black Crown Initiate is the sound of a sentient being at war with itself and everything else; an entity holding on for dear life as its inner and outer world dies.

Their first full length album will definitely be one of the best releases of the year and the fans of experimental and extreme progressive metal won't be disappointed.
